description: Create a maintenance requirement rule maintenance requirement set
permissions: User must be authorized to create the related maintenance requirement rule. Access follows MaintenanceRequirementRulePolicy#create?: admins; broker managers; operations users with appropriate business unit membership.
side_effects: Creates a maintenance requirement rule maintenance requirement set linking a rule to a template set.
validation_notes: --maintenance-requirement-rule and --maintenance-requirement-set are required. maintenance requirement set must be a template. maintenance requirement rule and set pair must be unique.

flags.name: --maintenance-requirement-set
flags.description: Maintenance requirement set ID (must be a template)
flags.validation: Must reference a template maintenance requirement set.
